snippet.title: World Cricket Championship 2 new update is live | Now play offline multiplayer & online multiplayer
snippet.description:
The most anticipated WCC2 update is here!  Be the first to experience the ultimate multiplayer. 
Play 1V1 with real players! 

Downlod the game from here - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nextwave.wcc2&hl=en_IN
Local Rivals - Play against real opponents without internet with our offline multiplayer mode. 
Online Rivals- Play real-time online cricket multiplayer against anyone from anywhere in a 1V1 cricket multiplayer format. 
Check out these new features in the world's most famous mobile cricket game 2019 and enjoy the new update for Android. Go cric, cric, cricket! 
World Cricket Championship 2 (WCC2) from the stables of Nextwave Multimedia is currently the No.1 mobile cricket game in the world. For three years in a row, WCC2 has been listed among App Annie’s Top 10 games by Monthly Users (2016, 2017 & 2018) and as Google’s Editor Choice (2016, 2017 & 2018).
